description: NOTICE OF PROPOSED PROCUREMENTThe Department of National Defence has a requirement for the items detailed below. The delivery is requested at CFB Esquimalt and CFB Halifax.Item 1, GSIN: 4820, NSN: 21-908-2596, DIAPHRAGM, VALVE, SPECIAL SHAPEDPart No.: 175-0029, NCAGE: 38881Quantity: 100, Unit of Issue: EA, to be delivered to CFB Esquimalt.Item 2, GSIN: 4820, NSN: 21-908-2596, DIAPHRAGM, VALVE, SPECIAL SHAPEDPart No.: 175-0029, NCAGE: 38881Quantity: 100, Unit of Issue: EA, to be delivered to CFB Halifax.Item 3, GSIN: 4820, NSN: 21-909-4380, DIAPHRAGM, VALVE, SPECIAL SHAPEDPart No.: 175-0039, NCAGE: 38881Quantity: 10, Unit of Issue: EA, to be delivered to CFB Esquimalt.Item 4, GSIN: 4820, NSN: 21-909-4380, DIAPHRAGM, VALVE, SPECIAL SHAPEDPart No.: 175-0039, NCAGE: 38881Quantity: 15, Unit of Issue: EA, to be delivered to CFB Halifax.Item 5, GSIN: 4820, NSN: 21-909-4850, DIAPHRAGM, VALVE, SPECIAL SHAPEDPart No.: 175-0024, NCAGE: 38881Quantity: 50, Unit of Issue: EA, to be delivered to CFB Esquimalt.Item 6, GSIN: 4820, NSN: 21-909-4850, DIAPHRAGM, VALVE, SPECIAL SHAPEDPart No.: 175-0024, NCAGE: 38881Quantity: 50, Unit of Issue: EA, to be delivered to CFB Halifax. Bidders proposing an Equivalent or a Substitute Product must indicate the brand name and model and/or Part Number and the NCAGE they are offering.Canadian Content - The requirement is subject to a preference for Canadian Goods and Services (CFTA)Bidders must submit prices in Canadian dollars. Bids submitted in foreign currency will be rejected.The Crown retains the rights to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.
full_summary:
### Formal Tender Announcement

#### Official Government Tender Notice
 The Department of National Defence is actively soliciting bids for the procurement of specialized diaphragm valves with unique shapes, as outlined in the Request for Proposal (RFP) listed below.

#### Contract Details
 * **Contract Title**: Procurement of Diaphragm Valves with Special Shapes
 * **Contract Number**: PW-22-01004136
 * **Amendment Number**: None
 * **Publication Date**: August 12, 2022
 * **Tender Closing Date**: September 21, 2022, at 14:00:00 Hours Eastern Daylight Time (EDT)
 * **Procurement Category**: Government of Canada
 * **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

#### Procurement Description
 The Department of National Defence is seeking quotations for the following items:

| CDC Item No. | Description | Unit Quantity | NCAGE Code | Delivery Location |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| 1 | Diaphragm, Valve, Special Shaped (A) | 100 EA | 38881 | Canadian Forces Base (CFB) Esquimalt |
| 2 | Diaphragm, Valve, Special Shaped (A) | 100 EA | 38881 | Canadian Forces Base (CFB) Halifax |
| 3 | Diaphragm, Valve, Special Shaped (A) | 10 EA | 38881 | Canadian Forces Base (CFB) Esquimalt |
| 4 | Diaphragm, Valve, Special Shaped (A) | 15 EA | 38881 | Canadian Forces Base (CFB) Halifax |
| 5 | Diaphragm, Valve, Special Shaped (B) | 50 EA | 38881 | Canadian Forces Base (CFB) Esquimalt |
| 6 | Diaphragm, Valve, Special Shaped (B) | 50 EA | 38881 | Canadian Forces Base (CFB) Halifax |

Bid Requirements:
 * The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.
 * Bidders must submit prices in Canadian dollars.
 * The documents may be presented in either official language of Canada.

#### Contact Information
For more information, please contact:

Jean-Pierre Normandin
Directorate Maritime Procurement
101 Colonel By Drive
Ottawa, ON K1A 0K2
Email: jean-pierre.normandin@forces.gc.ca
Phone
